T04TD3908E:1b-4: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T04TD3908E:1b-15: sangs rgyas kyi sa zhes bya ba yin no //
T04TD3908E:1b-16: ji ltar so ga'i smig rgyu ni //
T04TD3908E:1b-17: g-yo la 'khrul pa'i shes pa yis //
T04TD3908E:1b-18: ri dags chu ru 'dzin pa gang //
T04TD3908E:1b-19: dngos de yod pa ma yin no //
T04TD3908E:1b-20: de bzhin rnam shes sa bon gang //
T04TD3908E:1b-21: g-yo ba mthong ba'i spyod yul la //
T04TD3908E:1b-22: rab rib mun pa gang yin pas //
T04TD3908E:1b-24: gtong dang btang dang de bzhin sbyin //
T04TD3908E:1b-25: spangs dang bden par lta ba rnams //
T04TD3908E:1b-26: 'di dag rtog pa tsam nyid du ;
T04TD3908E:1b-27: / shes pas rnal 'byor ba de grol //
T04TD3908E:1b-28: snying po med pa'i chos 'di ni //
T04TD3908E:1b-29: rtog pa las ni ma lus byung //
T04TD3908E:1b-30: gang rtog de yang stong pa nyid //
T04TD3908E:1b-31: de ltar stong nyid grol ba yin //
T04TD3908E:2a-0: ji ltar mtsho chen stongs pa @2a * //
T04TD3908E:2a-2: / rlabs ni 'byung ba yod ma yin //
T04TD3908E:2a-3: de bzhin sna tshogs rnam shes ni //
T04TD3908E:2a-4: dngos med pa la 'jug pa med //
T04TD3908E:2a-5: stong zhing dngos po ma grub pas //
T04TD3908E:2a-6: sgyu ma'i dngos po skye ba med //
T04TD3908E:2a-7: de bzhin yod pa ma yin te //
T04TD3908E:2a-8: dngos po rmi lam lta bu yin //
T04TD3908E:2a-9: rang gi ngo bo gcig mthong ba //
T04TD3908E:2a-10: 'phags pa'i spyod yul mthong ba yin //
T04TD3908E:2a-11: gnyis kyi dngos po spong 'gyur te //
T04TD3908E:2a-12: 'dzin pa med cing gzung ba med //
T04TD3908E:2a-13: bcings pa med cing 'ching ba med //
T04TD3908E:2a-14: sgyu ma smig rgyu 'dra ba ste //
T04TD3908E:2a-15: rmi lam brjod pa rab rib bzhin //
T04TD3908E:2a-16: gang tshe de nyid don mthong ba //
T04TD3908E:2a-17: de tshe rnal 'byor mnyam gzhag pas //
T04TD3908E:2a-18: mi rtog brjod pa yod ma yin //
T04TD3908E:2a-19: rang gi mthong ba the tshom med //
T04TD3908E:2a-20: nam mkha'i chos ni 'ba' zhig bzhin //
T04TD3908E:2a-21: gang la rnam rig cung zad med //
T04TD3908E:2a-22: de bzhin chos 'di rnam shes pa //
T04TD3908E:2a-23: cung zad shes pa yod ma yin //
T04TD3908E:2a-24: 'byung ba dang ni gnas pa nyid //
T04TD3908E:2a-25: byis pa rmongs pa rnams la snang //
T04TD3908E:2a-26: shes rab rig pas lta ba la //
T04TD3908E:2a-27: skye ba dang ni gnas pa med //
T04TD3908E:2a-28: rtag tu mi rtog rigs pa yis //
T04TD3908E:2a-29: sems dang sems byung rnam spangs nas //
T04TD3908E:2a-30: bdag nyid lha ru shin tu gnas //
T04TD3908E:2a-31: sdig pa thams cad rnam par spangs //
T04TD3908E:2b-0: de ltar mkhyen pa rdzogs sangs @2b rgyas //
T04TD3908E:2b-1: 'di dag sprul par thugs su chud //
T04TD3908E:2b-2: mngon shes stobs la dbang thob nas //
T04TD3908E:2b-3: des ni 'gro ba mnyam par mkhyen //
T04TD3908E:2b-4: dang po dbus dang mtha' las grol //
T04TD3908E:2b-5: dngos dang dngos med rnam par spangs //
T04TD3908E:2b-6: mnyam pa nyid kyi go 'phang brnyes //
T04TD3908E:2b-7: dngos po med las sna tshogs byung //
T04TD3908E:2b-8: sems kyi rkyen de dang 'brel bas //
T04TD3908E:2b-10: rkyen rnams las ni nges 'byung ba //
T04TD3908E:2b-11: bdag ni yod par mi smra'o //
T04TD3908E:2b-12: ji ltar ri mo'i mtho dman ni //
T04TD3908E:2b-13: snang yang yod pa ma yin no //
T04TD3908E:2b-14: de ltar dngos rnams ngo bo nyid //
T04TD3908E:2b-15: mthong ba yod pa ma yin no ;
T04TD3908E:2b-16: / ji ltar dri za'i grong khyer dang //
T04TD3908E:2b-17: ri dags chu ru 'dzin pa bzhin //
T04TD3908E:2b-18: rtag tu snang zhing dmigs pa ni //
T04TD3908E:2b-19: shes rab kyis ni yod ma yin //
T04TD3908E:2b-20: byis pas bris dang 'bri ba yi //
T04TD3908E:2b-21: mngon shes la dbang de dag gi / sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyi //
T04TD3908E:2b-22: 'bras bu'ang sgyu ma lta bu yin //
T04TD3908E:2b-23: smig rgyu sgyu ma'i stobs kyis ni //
T04TD3908E:2b-24: dngos med de nyid 'dzin pa na //
T04TD3908E:2b-25: sems byung sems dang bdag med pas //
T04TD3908E:2b-26: 'di ltar byis pa rnams ni skrag / gang na cung zad skye med la //
T04TD3908E:2b-27: 'gal ba'i rkyen ni yod ma yin //
T04TD3908E:2b-28: skye ba dang ni 'gag pa la //
T04TD3908E:2b-29: rkyen ni rtog pa gcig pu yin //
T04TD3908E:2b-30: rnam rig tsam du 'byung ba rnams //
T04TD3908E:2b-31: dngos po'i rang bzhin yod ma yin //
T04TD3908E:2b-32: rtog par 'gyur ba'i rtog ge pa //
T04TD3908E:2b-33: btags pa tsam du bsgom pa na //
T04TD3908E:2b-34: rang bzhin med cing rnam rig med //
T04TD3908E:2b-35: dngos po med cing kun gzhi med //
T04TD3908E:2b-36: 'di dag byis pas rab tu btags //
T04TD3908E:2b-37: rtog ge ngan pas kun tu bskyed//
T04TD3908E:2b-38: 'dir ni sems med gzugs yod min //
T04TD3908E:2b-39: 'khrul pa'i sems las lhag par med //
T04TD3908E:2b-40: 'byung ba kun la gnas nas ni //
T04TD3908E:2b-41: gang tshe sems ni rab 'jug pa //
T04TD3908E:2b-42: de tshe mi gnas rnal 'byor pas //
T04TD3908E:2b-43: 'gro la rigs pas lta ba na //
T04TD3908E:2b-44: mtshan ma dngos po rnam rig dang //
T04TD3908E:2b-45: yid kyis g-yo ba yod ma yin //
T04TD3908E:2b-46: bdag med dbang po gang yin dang //
T04TD3908E:2b-47: rnam par rtog pas 'jig par byed //
T04TD3908E:2b-48: yul rnams rmi lam lta bur gnas //
T04TD3908E:2b-49: las dang 'bras bu bya ba nyid //
T04TD3908E:2b-50: thams cad du yang dmigs ma yin //
T04TD3908E:2b-51: bsam gtan rnams dang tshad med dang //
T04TD3908E:3a-3: sems nyid tsam du gnas pa yin //
T04TD3908E:3a-4: rnam par rtog pa rnam rtog pa //
T04TD3908E:3a-5: rnam par rtog pas kun brtags pa //
T04TD3908E:3a-6: yang dag lta la stong pa nyid //
T04TD3908E:3a-8: de nyid de las gzhan pa'ang min //
T04TD3908E:3a-9: sa rnams med cing bden pa med //
T04TD3908E:3a-10: zhing dang sprul sku yod ma yin //
T04TD3908E:3a-11: rang sangs rgyas dang sangs rgyas dang //
T04TD3908E:3a-12: nyan thos kyang ni brtags pa yin //
T04TD3908E:3a-13: gang zag rgyud dang phung po dang //
T04TD3908E:3a-14: rkyen rnams gnas pa ma yin no //
T04TD3908E:3a-15: gtso bo dbang phyug byed po rnams //
T04TD3908E:3a-16: sems tsam la ni rnam par brtags //
T04TD3908E:3a-17: chos kun ngo bo yod ma yin //
T04TD3908E:3a-18: kun nas nyon mongs med cing grol //
T04TD3908E:3a-19: ji ltar snang ba de ltar med //
T04TD3908E:3a-20: med pa ma yin yod pa min //
T04TD3908E:3a-21: skye ba med pa'i chos 'di ni //
T04TD3908E:3a-22: yod dang med pa ma yin no //
T04TD3908E:3a-23: dri za'i grong khyer rmi lam dang //
T04TD3908E:3a-24: sgyu ma sprul pa lta bur gnas //
T04TD3908E:3a-25: gang zhig sangs rgyas lta bar ni //
T04TD3908E:3a-26: rang bzhin gyis ni nus ma yin //
T04TD3908E:3a-27: de lta bas na thob pa med //
T04TD3908E:3a-28: rang bzhin med par blta bar bya //
T04TD3908E:3a-29: gang zhig rang bzhin rang bzhin med //
T04TD3908E:3a-30: de ni brtags pa'i mtshan nyid yin //
T04TD3908E:3a-31: tshig dang sems kyi spyod yul brdzun //
T04TD3908E:3a-32: brdzun pa'i shes pas rnam brtags pa'i //
T04TD3908E:3a-33: mtha' gnyis su ni sems ltung bas //
T04TD3908E:3a-34: de phyir mi rtog shes rab kyis //
T04TD3908E:3a-35: yod dang med pa'i mtha' gnyis po //
T04TD3908E:3a-36: gang zhig sems kyi spyod yul ba //
T04TD3908E:3a-37: spyod yul rnam par bsal nas ni //
T04TD3908E:3a-38: yang dag sems ni ldog par 'gyur //
T04TD3908E:3a-39: gzung dang 'dzin pa dngos med pas //
T04TD3908E:3a-40: 'gag pa med pa ma yin no //
T04TD3908E:3a-41: ji ltar gnas pa'i dngos po ni //
T04TD3908E:3a-42: de ltar 'phags pa'i spyod yul yin //
T04TD3908E:3a-43: ji ltar byis la mi snang ba //
T04TD3908E:3a-44: de ltar mkhas la snang ba yin //
T04TD3908E:3a-45: ji ltar snang ba de ltar ni //
T04TD3908E:3a-46: sangs rgyas chos rnams mtshan nyid med //
T04TD3908E:3a-47: gang zhig ma skyas mi skye la //
T04TD3908E:3a-48: skyes pa yang ni ma yin no //
T04TD3908E:3a-49: rkyen gyis yod dang med pa yang //
T04TD3908E:3a-50: de rnams de ltar mi gnas so //
T04TD3908E:3a-51: theg chen zhes bya'i theg pa ni //
T04TD3908E:3a-52: sgra min yi ge ma yin te //
T04TD3908E:3a-53: bden pa med cing nges grol med //
T04TD3908E:3a-54: snang ba med pa'i spyod yul min //
T04TD3908E:3b-0: ma skyes pa yi stong @3b nyid gcig / gcig ni skyes pa stong pa ste //
T04TD3908E:3b-1: ma skyes pa yi stong nyid mchog / skyes pa'i stong pa 'jig pa yin //
T04TD3908E:3b-2: de bzhin nyid stong yang dag mtha' //
T04TD3908E:3b-3: mya ngan 'das dang chos kyi dbyings //
T04TD3908E:3b-4: lus sems dper ni sgyu ma nyid //
T04TD3908E:3b-5: sgyu ma'i grangs su bstan pa yin //
T04TD3908E:3b-6: gang gi cung zad skye med la //
T04TD3908E:3b-7: cung zad 'gag pa yod min la //
T04TD3908E:3b-8: de yi yod med mtshungs pas na //
T04TD3908E:3b-9: 'gro ba rnams kyis dben par mthong //
T04TD3908E:3b-10: 'di na dngos rnams mi dmigs pas //
T04TD3908E:3b-11: dngos med spangs pa'i rnal 'byor pa //
T04TD3908E:3b-12: dngos dang dngos med mnyam pa nyid //
T04TD3908E:3b-14: gang gis bdag gi sems mthong na //
T04TD3908E:3b-15: phyi yi don ni yod ma yin //
T04TD3908E:3b-16: de ltar dngos la ma 'khrul na //
T04TD3908E:3b-17: de bzhin nyid kyang rjes su dmigs //
T04TD3908E:3b-18: gang tshe yid dang sems dang ni //
T04TD3908E:3b-19: rnam par shes pa'ang mi 'jug la //
T04TD3908E:3b-21: sangs rgyas kyi ni sa yang 'thob //
T04TD3908E:3b-22: rkyen gyi tshig dang phung po dang //
T04TD3908E:3b-23: rnam par rig pa gang zag sems //
T04TD3908E:3b-24: chos rnams 'di dag mtshan nyid ni //
T04TD3908E:3b-25: rmi lam skra shad lta bu yin //
T04TD3908E:3b-26: sna tshogs shes pas 'khor bar gnas //
T04TD3908E:3b-27: de las gnas pa 'byung ba yin //
T04TD3908E:3b-28: rtsig pa yod par ri mo bzhin //
T04TD3908E:3b-29: sna tshogs shes pas gnas pa yin //
T04TD3908E:3b-30: ji ltar dngos med med dngos med //
T04TD3908E:3b-31: nam mkha'i rang bzhin bzhin du brjod //
T04TD3908E:3b-32: de bzhin kun gzhi'i 'bras bu gang //
T04TD3908E:3b-33: dngos dang dngos med rnam spangs te //
T04TD3908E:3b-34: rgyud gsum rnam par bcad nas ni //
T04TD3908E:3b-35: sems kyi rgyun ni rnam par spangs //
T04TD3908E:3b-36: lus ni mtha' bzhi dag las grol //
T04TD3908E:3b-37: dngos po rtag tu sgyu ma bzhin //
T04TD3908E:3b-38: theg gcig la ni theg gsum du //
T04TD3908E:3b-39: 'phags rnams gsung ba bdag cag ni //
T04TD3908E:3b-40: byis pa blo dman rnams la yin //
T04TD3908E:3b-41: 'phags pa rnams la de nyid stong //
T04TD3908E:3b-42: rnam par rtog pa nyid 'phel ba'i //
T04TD3908E:3b-43: rkyen las skyes pa'i 'jig rten ni //
T04TD3908E:3b-44: sgyu ma la sogs rmi lam 'drar //
T04TD3908E:3b-45: gang gis rab mthong rnam par grol //
T04TD3908E:3b-46: sems kyi gnyis med dag pa yis //
T04TD3908E:3b-48: 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin nyid stong bas //
T04TD3908E:3b-49: des na sems ni mthong ma yin //
T04TD3908E:3b-50: mtshan nyid mtshan gzhi ldan par ni //
T04TD3908E:4a-2: gang gis 'khor ba rnam bsal nas //
T04TD3908E:4a-3: 'gro ba rang gi sems su rtog / sems tsam la ni brten nas su //
T04TD3908E:4a-4: phyi rol don ni mi rtag go //
T04TD3908E:4a-5: de bzhin nyid dmigs gnas nas ni //
T04TD3908E:4a-6: sems tsam las ni 'da' bar bya //
T04TD3908E:4a-7: sems tsam las ni 'das nas su //
T04TD3908E:4a-8: snang ba med las 'da' bar bya //
T04TD3908E:4a-9: snang med gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa //
T04TD3908E:4a-10: de yis theg pa chen po mthong //
T04TD3908E:4a-11: de ltar shes rab dag pa yis //
T04TD3908E:4a-12: rang gi ngo bo don dam 'di //
T04TD3908E:4a-13: shin tu yang ni grub pa na //
T04TD3908E:4a-14: brtag pa'i gzhan dngos 'byung ma yin //
T04TD3908E:4a-15: 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa'i bsgom pa'i rim pa rdzogs so /
T04TD3908E:4a-17: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po pandi ta lo ta dang /
